list_definition.definition: the right of directing or of giving orders; power or authority

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She has control over all the decisions in that department
She has no control over that dog.

list_definition.definition: the act of holding back or restraining

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I know you’re angry but you must not lose control (of yourself).

list_definition.definition: a lever, button etc which operates (a machine etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The clutch and accelerator are foot controls in a car.

list_definition.definition: a point or place at which an inspection takes place

list_definition.mean_english: có quyền lực đối với ai/cái gì
list_definition.definition: to direct or guide; to have power or authority over

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The captain controls the whole ship

list_definition.definition: to hold back; to restrain (oneself or one’s emotions etc)
to keep to a fixed standard
